name: Phil Scott for Vermont
tweet: With the new year bringing the promise of better days ahead, Diana and I wish you and your family a healthy and happy holiday season, and a safe and prosperous 2021.   #MerryChristmas, Vermont!

name: Phil Scott for Vermont
tweet: As we celebrate a Christmas like no other, it is important to reflect on all that we can be grateful for. Although 2020 has posed many challenges and hardships, Vermont continues to light the way with our sense of community and service, and our commitment to each other. 1/2  https://t.co/LdQGyZAxTZ

name: Phil Scott for Vermont
tweet: “I want to congratulate President-elect Biden and Vice President-Elect Harris.”  “This is our moment in time to reclaim our moral compass, move the United States forward and live up to our greatest ideals: Equal rights, equal justice and equal opportunity for every American.” ⬇️

name: Phil Scott for Vermont
tweet: Thank you, Gov. @LarryHogan, for your leadership and support!

name: Phil Scott for Vermont
tweet: @BRVermont Thank you, Rep. @BRVermont. You as well.

name: Phil Scott for Vermont
tweet: Thank you, Vermont. I'm humbled by your faith in me.  Since my first day in office, I've made growing the economy, making VT more affordable and protecting the most vulnerable my top priorities. These will be just as important during my next term as they were in my first. #vtpoli  https://t.co/Abq6bAtJV6

name: Phil Scott for Vermont
tweet: Today, Vermonters have spoken and I’m humbled to earn your support once again.  Your faith and trust in me is the greatest honor of my life and I will continue to work as hard as I can -- every single day -- for you.   https://t.co/SI5Kvzvsvd #vtpoli

name: Phil Scott for Vermont
tweet: Together, we can prove that the strength of our nation is in the diversity of our people and opinions. We can demonstrate that listening to and learning from each other is how we make the most progress.   It’s the only way we’ll be able to work together to rebuild and recover.

name: Phil Scott for Vermont
tweet: At a time when our nation feels so divided, it’s clear to me that Vermont can lead the way once again. We can rise above partisanship, be better role models and treat everyone – even when we disagree – with the dignity and respect they deserve.#vtpoli  https://t.co/CSCt3KGvRc

name: Phil Scott for Vermont
tweet: It’s up to each of us to be better role models, because our kids are watching and they want to be just like us.    I’ve never run a negative campaign in my life and that won’t change. name: Phil Scott for Vermont
tweet: We all know the science is real, a child’s brain develops immensely fast from 0-5 years old, and investing in our kids early is one of the most important things we can do and it will pay big dividends in years to come. 3/3

name: Phil Scott for Vermont
tweet: In fact, I’ve proposed and signed record funding increases for the Child Care Financial Assistance Program -- a 30% increase under my watch as Governor. If the Legislature had agreed to my other proposals in this area, we'd be spending nearly is double what we currently do. 2/3

name: Phil Scott for Vermont
tweet: Since my very first Inaugural Address as Governor, I’ve made early care and learning a top priority for my Administration. We've worked hard to support providers through the pandemic, and even prior, we made significant investments. 1/3    https://t.co/f0J55No1nx

name: Phil Scott for Vermont
tweet: When I was first elected to the Senate, Sen. Dick Mazza — Vermont’s longest serving state senator and a lifelong Democrat — took me under his wing. He showed me the importance of putting people over politics. I’m honored to have his support and I’m proud to support him. #vtpoli  https://t.co/9LFPVyX2ni

name: Phil Scott for Vermont
tweet: I ran this ad two years ago and it's still true today.  We desperately need to come together and stand up to political polarization. We need to treat others -- even when we disagree -- with the dignity and respect they deserve.   That's how I've tried to lead as Governor. #vtpoli  https://t.co/PYiNHE86hs

name: Phil Scott for Vermont
tweet: Although the best politicians are usually the best talkers, I've always believed the best leaders are the best listeners.   My approach has always been: listen, learn and then lead. That's how I've handled my time as Governor, and it's how I'll continue to lead in a third term.  https://t.co/c2oi7mfETm

name: Phil Scott for Vermont
tweet: @PJack1964 Hi Jack, Governor Scott has proposed eliminating the tax on military retirement pay — joining almost every other state in the nation — in each of his budgets. Unfortunately, the Legislature has not agreed to this repeated recommendation.

name: Phil Scott for Vermont
tweet: Vermont is a model for our response to COVID-19, but there are still challenging times ahead. As we rebuild and recover, it's critical we maintain our work to make VT more affordable for families and small businesses. That will continue to be my priority in a third term. #vtpoli  https://t.co/7XJUqIgiRL
